posts.description: Is there a service or a(n open-source) library that could help in programmatically manage files stored on Azure blob storage. By manage I mean search with security trimming, authorizing download,

posts.message: A good series of posts for learning F# and more important learning how to "program functionally"
posts.caption: fsharpforfunandprofit.com
posts.description: This series of posts will introduce you to the fundamentals of functional programming – what does it really mean to "program functionally", and how this approach differs from object oriented or imperative programming.

posts.message: For those who love Raspberry Pi
posts.caption: raspberrypitutorials.yolasite.com
posts.description: Unless you live underneath a rock, you will have most definitely been awakened to the newly released Raspberry Pi 2, via the social media 'geekgasm'! As an example, my twitter feed had back-to-back posts about the newly arrived model of the Raspberry Pi.

posts.message:
I'm not sure if this is relevant here, but please humor me if it isn't. Our Android developer has some free time on his hands. If any one of you is working on an app and needs assistance, we can help. 

You can reach me at afathalla@getusertalk.com

Hi Guys,
Is Entity Framework suitable for application which makes automated operations, most of these operations are inserting using multiple threads ?

my case is : 
- small database contain 8 tables
- only two table are used for automated insert and they are the main tables for the system 
- the application perform insert operations in parallel
- the underline table contain about 1.5 millions of records 
//note, i used instance per request 

Please advise
